gr.forth.ics.jbenchy.fluent
Interface AggregateBuilder

All Known Subinterfaces:
Aggregator, ReportBuilder
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAggregator
public interface AggregateBuilder

A "fluent" interface that is used in Aggregator (through ReportBuilder) to provide a simple way for creating queries of the form "the sum of this variable, per each distinct combination of values for those variables", or "the average of this variable, for all records".

Author:
andreou
